title: STP15: 5% bonus for BTCST holders from 3 months onwards?
body:
In order to retain loyal investors, why not share rewards and profits with them? I suggest to divide 5% each of tBtc, tLtc.....in the future for those who own BTCST from 3 months onwards.
* Which means that any subsequent project...will split 5% of the total project value among those holding BTCST from 3 months onwards.
author: 0xcefbEfFE05B65964a93894750715DcC06ec45513
